headline.main: Marijuana Help for Cancer Victim; Illegal Use by Patient Care by Private Doctors

docs.abstract: NM certifies lung cancer patient Lynn Pierson, 27, as 1st patient in US program permitting therapeutic use of marijuana to counteract chemotherapy side effects; marijuana to be grown under Fed supervision in Miss (S)

byline.original: Special to The New York Times

docs.lead_paragraph: ALBUQUERQUE, N.M., July 13--The State of New Mexico has certified a 27year-old cancer victim as the first patient in the nation's first legislatively mandated therapeutic marijuana program.
docs.snippet: ALBUQUERQUE, N.M., July 13--The State of New Mexico has certified a 27year-old cancer victim as the first patient in the nation's first legislatively mandated therapeutic marijuana program.
